name: A rippling aphotic band
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The ring spreads darkness by absorbing nearby light.
